long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The WaxLinker Extension will bridge the gap between Twitter and the WAX blockchain by enabling users to link their Twitter accounts with their WAX wallets. This will allow users to view and interact with NFTs directly within the Twitter platform. The main objective of the WaxLinker Extension is to enhance the user experience for NFT enthusiasts on Twitter by providing seamless access to their WAX wallet.
